version: '3'

services:
  # åç«¯æœåŠ¡
  api:
    build: 
      context: .
      dockerfile: backend/Dockerfile
    container_name: dair-backend
    volumes:
      - downloads:/app/downloads
      - uploads:/app/dair/uploads
      - logs:/app/dair/logs
      - trajectory:/app/backend/dc_agents/trajectory
      - ./cookies.json:/app/cookies.json:ro
    environment:
      - MONGO_URI=mongodb://dair:Dair1234@mongoreplicaed6a95949b2c0.mongodb.cn-hongkong.ivolces.com:3717,mongoreplicaed6a95949b2c1.mongodb.cn-hongkong.ivolces.com:3717/?authSource=admin&replicaSet=rs-mongo-replica-ed6a95949b2c&retryWrites=true
      - REDIS_URL=redis://redis:6379/0
      - API_HOST=0.0.0.0
      - API_PORT=8000
    depends_on:
      - redis
    networks:
      - main-network
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "curl -f http://localhost:8000/health || exit 1"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
      start_period: 30s
  

  
  # å‰ç«¯æ„å»ºæœåŠ¡
  frontend-builder:
    build:
      context: ./frontend
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    volumes:
      - ./frontend:/app
      - ./frontend/dist:/app/dist
    command: sh -c "npm install && npm run build"
    networks:
      - main-network
  
  # NginxæœåŠ¡
  nginx:
    build:
      context: ./nginx
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    container_name: dair-nginx
    ports:
      - "80:80"
      - "443:443"
    volumes:
      - ./frontend/dist:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro
      - ./data/certbot/conf:/etc/letsencrypt
      - ./data/certbot/www:/var/www/certbot
    depends_on:
      - api
      - frontend-builder
    networks:
      - main-network
      
  # RedisæœåŠ¡
  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    container_name: dair-redis
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "6379:6379"
    command: >
      redis-server 
      --maxmemory 256mb
      --maxmemory-policy allkeys-lru
      --save 900 1
      --save 300 10
      --save 60 10000
      --appendonly yes
      --appendfsync everysec
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data
      - ./backend/redis.conf:/usr/local/etc/redis/redis.conf:ro
    networks:
      - main-network
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "ping"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3

volumes:
  mongodb_data:
  redis_data:
  downloads:
  trajectory:
  uploads:
  logs:

networks:
  main-network:
    driver: bridge

  frontend-builder:
    image: ${ALI_DOCKER_REGISTRY}/deepcognition-build/dc-frontend:latest
    volumes:
      - ./frontend:/app
      - ./frontend/dist:/app/dist
    command: sh -c "npm install && npm run build"
    networks:
      - main-network

  # NginxæœåŠ¡
  nginx:
    image: ${ALI_DOCKER_REGISTRY}/deepcognition-build/dc-nginx:latest
    container_name: dair-nginx
    ports:
      - "80:80"
      - "443:443"
    volumes:
      - ./frontend/dist:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro
      - ./data/certbot/conf:/etc/letsencrypt
      - ./data/certbot/www:/var/www/certbot
    depends_on:
      - api
      - frontend-builder
    networks:
      - main-network

  # RedisæœåŠ¡
  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    container_name: dair-redis
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: >
      redis-server 
      --maxmemory 512mb
      --maxmemory-policy allkeys-lru
      --save 900 1
      --save 300 10
      --save 60 10000
      --appendonly yes
      --appendfsync everysec
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data
    networks:
      - main-network
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "ping"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3

volumes:
  mongodb_data:
  redis_data:
  downloads:
  trajectory:
  uploads:
  logs:


networks:
  main-network:
    driver: bridge

async def daily_token_refresh_task():
    """æ¯æ—¥tokenåˆ·æ–°å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡"""
    from backend.auth.token_service import TokenLimitService
    
    while True:
        try:
            now = datetime.now()
            # è®¾ç½®ä¸ºæ¯å¤©å‡Œæ™¨2ç‚¹æ‰§è¡Œ
            target_time = now.replace(hour=2, minute=0, second=0, microsecond=0)
            
            # å¦‚æœå·²ç»è¿‡äº†ä»Šå¤©çš„2ç‚¹ï¼Œè®¾ç½®ä¸ºæ˜å¤©çš„2ç‚¹
            if now > target_time:
                target_time = target_time.replace(day=target_time.day + 1)
            
            # è®¡ç®—ç­‰å¾…æ—¶é—´
            wait_seconds = (target_time - now).total_seconds()
            logger.info(f"ä¸‹æ¬¡tokenåˆ·æ–°æ—¶é—´: {target_time}, ç­‰å¾… {wait_seconds/3600:.1f} å°æ—¶")
            
            await asyncio.sleep(wait_seconds)
            
            # æ‰§è¡Œåˆ·æ–°ä»»åŠ¡
            logger.info("å¼€å§‹æ‰§è¡Œæ¯æ—¥tokenåˆ·æ–°ä»»åŠ¡")
            token_service = TokenLimitService()
            user_ids = await token_service.get_all_user_ids()
            
            success_count = 0
            for user_id in user_ids:
                try:
                    success = await token_service._check_and_refresh_daily_tokens(user_id)
                    if success:
                        success_count += 1
                except Exception as e:
                    logger.error(f"åˆ·æ–°ç”¨æˆ· {user_id} tokenå¤±è´¥: {e}")
            
            logger.info(f"æ¯æ—¥tokenåˆ·æ–°å®Œæˆ: æˆåŠŸ {success_count}/{len(user_ids)} ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·")
            
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"æ¯æ—¥tokenåˆ·æ–°ä»»åŠ¡å¼‚å¸¸: {e}")
            # å‡ºç°å¼‚å¸¸æ—¶ç­‰å¾…1å°æ—¶åé‡è¯•
            await asyncio.sleep(3600)

@router.post("/login", response_model=Token)
async def login(form_data: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), request: Request = None):
    """
    ç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•
    """
    try:
        user_repo = UserRepository()
        user = await user_repo.authenticate_user(form_data.username, form_data.password)

        if not user:
            logger.warning(f"ç™»å½•å¤±è´¥: ç”¨æˆ·åæˆ–å¯†ç é”™è¯¯ - {form_data.username}")
            raise HTTPException(
                status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
                detail="ç”¨æˆ·åæˆ–å¯†ç é”™è¯¯",
                headers={"WWW-Authenticate": "Bearer"},
            )

        # åˆ›å»ºè®¿é—®ä»¤ç‰Œ
        access_token_expires = timedelta(minutes=ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_MINUTES)
        access_token = create_access_token(
            data={"sub": user.username},
            expires_delta=access_token_expires
        )

        # è¿½è¸ªç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•äº‹ä»¶
        try:
            telemetry_service = await get_telemetry_service()
            await telemetry_service.track_user_login(
                user_id=str(user.id),
                session_id=None,  # ç™»å½•æ—¶è¿˜æ²¡æœ‰session_id
                ip_address=request.client.host if request and request.client else None,
                user_agent=request.headers.get("user-agent") if request else None
            )
            logger.info(f"ç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•äº‹ä»¶è¿½è¸ªæˆåŠŸ: {user.username}")
        except Exception as e:
            logger.warning(f"ç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•äº‹ä»¶è¿½è¸ªå¤±è´¥: {e}")

        logger.info(f"ç”¨æˆ· {user.username} ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸ")
        return {"access_token": access_token, "token_type": "bearer"}
    except HTTPException:
        raise
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"ç™»å½•è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: {e!s}")
        raise HTTPException(
            status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
            detail="ç™»å½•è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åå†è¯•"
        )

@router.get("/my-chats")
async def get_my_chats(
    skip: int = 0,
    limit: int = 20,
    current_user: UserDB = Depends(get_current_active_user)
):
    """
    è·å–å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ‰€æœ‰å¯¹è¯å†å²
    
    Args:
        skip: è·³è¿‡æ•°é‡ï¼Œé»˜è®¤0
        limit: è¿”å›æ•°é‡é™åˆ¶ï¼Œé»˜è®¤20ä¸ªï¼Œæœ€å¤§100ä¸ª
    
    è¿”å›ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ‰€æœ‰å†å²å¯¹è¯è®°å½•æ‘˜è¦ä¿¡æ¯
    """
    try:
        # é™åˆ¶æœ€å¤§è¿”å›æ•°é‡
        limit = min(limit, 100)

        # åˆ›å»ºResearchMemoryå®ä¾‹
        research_memory = ResearchMemory("", "Researcher")  # éœ€è¦æä¾›å¿…è¦çš„å‚æ•°

        # è·å–å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ‰€æœ‰å¯¹è¯
        user_id = str(current_user.id)
        chats = await research_memory.get_all_conversations(user_id=user_id, skip=skip, limit=limit)

        # æ ¼å¼åŒ–è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        for chat in chats:
            # ç¡®ä¿created_atæ˜¯ISOæ ¼å¼çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
            if isinstance(chat.get("created_at"), datetime):
                chat["created_at"] = chat["created_at"].isoformat()

            # æˆªæ–­æç¤ºæ–‡æœ¬(å¦‚æœè¿‡é•¿)
            if len(chat.get("prompt", "")) > 100:
                chat["prompt"] = chat["prompt"][:100] + "..."

        return {
            "chats": chats,
            "total": len(chats),
            "skip": skip,
            "limit": limit
        }
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"è·å–ç”¨æˆ·å¯¹è¯å†å²å¤±è´¥: {e!s}")
        raise HTTPException(
            status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
            detail="è·å–å¯¹è¯å†å²å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åå†è¯•"
        )

@router.get("/admin/invite-codes", response_model=InviteCodePage)
async def get_invite_codes(
    skip: int = 0,
    limit: int = 10,
    status: str = Query("all", enum=["all", "used", "unused"]),
    current_user: UserDB = Depends(get_current_admin_user)
):
    """è·å–é‚€è¯·ç åˆ—è¡¨ï¼ˆå«åˆ†é¡µï¼‰"""
    invite_repo = InviteCodeRepository()

    for code in codes_from_db:

    return {"items": codes_from_db, "total": total}

    current_user: UserDB = Depends(get_current_admin_user)
):
    """è·å–æ‰€æœ‰ç”¨æˆ·åˆ—è¡¨ï¼ˆç®¡ç†å‘˜ä¸“ç”¨ï¼‰"""
    user_repo = UserRepository()
    
    # è·å–æ‰€æœ‰ç”¨æˆ·
    users = await user_repo.get_all_users(skip=skip, limit=limit)
    
    # è·å–æ€»æ•°ï¼ˆç”¨äºåˆ†é¡µï¼‰
    total = await user_repo.count({})
    
    # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå“åº”æ ¼å¼

        users_data.append({

    return {

        "total": total
    }

@router.get("/oauth/authorize")
async def oauth_authorize(
    response_type: str = Query(..., description="å“åº”ç±»å‹"),
    client_id: str = Query(..., description="å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ID"),
    redirect_uri: str = Query(..., description="é‡å®šå‘URI"),
    scope: str = Query("read", description="æˆæƒèŒƒå›´"),
    state: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="çŠ¶æ€å‚æ•°"),
    request: Request = None,
    current_user: Optional[UserDB] = Depends(get_optional_current_user),
):
    """
    OAuth 2.0 æˆæƒç«¯ç‚¹
    éªŒè¯æˆæƒè¯·æ±‚å¹¶è¿”å›æˆæƒé¡µé¢ä¿¡æ¯
    """
    try:
        oauth_service = OAuthService()
        
        # éªŒè¯æˆæƒè¯·æ±‚
        validation_result = await oauth_service.validate_authorization_request(
            client_id=client_id,
            redirect_uri=redirect_uri,
            response_type=response_type,
            scope=scope
        )
        
        if not validation_result["valid"]:
            # æ„å»ºé”™è¯¯é‡å®šå‘URL
            error_params = {
                "error": validation_result["error"],
                "error_description": validation_result["error_description"]
            }
            if state:
                error_params["state"] = state
            
            error_url = f"{redirect_uri}?{urlencode(error_params)}"
            # è‹¥æ˜¯æµè§ˆå™¨ç›´è·³ï¼ˆéXHR/axiosï¼‰ï¼Œé‡å®šå‘åˆ°å‰ç«¯ä»¥å±•ç¤ºé”™è¯¯
            accept_header = (request.headers.get("accept") or "").lower() if request else ""
            sec_fetch_mode = (request.headers.get("sec-fetch-mode") or "").lower() if request else ""
            if "text/html" in accept_header and sec_fetch_mode == "navigate":
                # ä½¿ç”¨ç›¸å¯¹è·¯å¾„ï¼Œäº¤ç”±å‰ç«¯è·¯ç”±ï¼ˆNginxç»Ÿä¸€åŸŸåä¸‹è½¬å‘åˆ°å‰ç«¯åº”ç”¨ï¼‰
                frontend_authorize_url = f"/oauth/authorize?response_type={response_type}&client_id={client_id}&redirect_uri={redirect_uri}&scope={scope}{'&state=' + state if state else ''}"
                return RedirectResponse(frontend_authorize_url, status_code=302)
            return {
                "error": validation_result["error"],
                "error_description": validation_result["error_description"],
                "redirect_url": error_url
            }
        
        # æµè§ˆå™¨ç›´è¾¾æ—¶ï¼ˆéXHR/axiosï¼‰ï¼Œç»Ÿä¸€é‡å®šå‘åˆ°å‰ç«¯é¡µé¢ï¼Œç”±å‰ç«¯è·¯ç”±å®ˆå«å†³å®šæ˜¯å¦å…ˆç™»å½•
        accept_header = (request.headers.get("accept") or "").lower() if request else ""
        sec_fetch_mode = (request.headers.get("sec-fetch-mode") or "").lower() if request else ""
        if "text/html" in accept_header and sec_fetch_mode == "navigate":
            # å°†åŸå§‹æŸ¥è¯¢å‚æ•°ä¼ é€’ç»™å‰ç«¯è·¯ç”±ï¼ˆç›¸å¯¹è·¯å¾„ï¼‰
            original_query = str(request.url.query) if request else ""
            frontend_authorize_url = f"/oauth/authorize{('?' + original_query) if original_query else ''}"
            return RedirectResponse(frontend_authorize_url, status_code=302)

        # è¿”å›æˆæƒé¡µé¢éœ€è¦çš„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä¾›SDK/ç¨‹åºåŒ–è°ƒç”¨ï¼‰ï¼ŒåŒ…å«ç™»å½•æç¤º
        client = validation_result["client"]
        
        # æ£€æŸ¥æƒé™
        permission_granted = True
        permission_error = None
        if current_user and client.required_permission:
            from backend.auth.crud import RoleRepository, PermissionRepository
            from backend.auth.rbac import get_user_permissions
            
            role_repo = RoleRepository()
            permission_repo = PermissionRepository()
            user_permissions = await get_user_permissions(current_user, role_repo, permission_repo)
            
            if client.required_permission not in user_permissions:
                permission_granted = False
                permission_error = f"æ‚¨æ²¡æœ‰è®¿é—® {client.client_name} çš„æƒé™ã€‚éœ€è¦æƒé™: {client.required_permission}"
                logger.warning(
                    f"ç”¨æˆ· {current_user.username} (ID: {current_user.id}) æŸ¥çœ‹ OAuth æˆæƒé¡µé¢ï¼Œ"
                    f"ä½†ç¼ºå°‘æ‰€éœ€æƒé™: {client.required_permission}"
                )
        
        return {
            "client_name": client.client_name,
            "client_description": client.client_description,
            "scopes": validation_result["scopes"],
            "redirect_uri": redirect_uri,
            "state": state,
            "client_id": client_id,
            "response_type": response_type,
            "scope": scope,
            "login_required": current_user is None,
            "permission_required": client.required_permission,
            "permission_granted": permission_granted,
            "permission_error": permission_error,
            "user": ({
                "id": str(getattr(current_user, 'id', '')),
                "username": getattr(current_user, 'username', ''),
                "email": getattr(current_user, 'email', '')
            } if current_user else None),
            "login_url": (
                (
                    "/login?" +
                    urlencode({
                        "redirect": f"/oauth/authorize?response_type={response_type}&client_id={client_id}&redirect_uri={redirect_uri}&scope={scope}{'&state=' + state if state else ''}"
                    })
                ) if current_user is None else None
            )
        }
        
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"OAuthæˆæƒéªŒè¯å¤±è´¥: {e!s}")
        raise HTTPException(
            status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
            detail="æˆæƒéªŒè¯å¤±è´¥"
        )


@router.post("/oauth/authorize")
async def oauth_authorize_confirm(
    request: OAuthAuthorizationRequest,
    approved: Optional[bool] = Query(None),
    current_user: UserDB = Depends(get_current_active_user)
):
    """
    OAuth 2.0 æˆæƒç¡®è®¤ç«¯ç‚¹
    ç”¨æˆ·ç¡®è®¤æˆæƒååˆ›å»ºæˆæƒç 
    """
    try:
        oauth_service = OAuthService()
        
        # éªŒè¯æˆæƒè¯·æ±‚
        validation_result = await oauth_service.validate_authorization_request(
            client_id=request.client_id,
            redirect_uri=request.redirect_uri,
            response_type=request.response_type,
            scope=request.scope
        )
        
        if not validation_result["valid"]:
            raise HTTPException(
                status_code=status.HTTP_400_BAD_REQUEST,
                detail=validation_result["error_description"]
            )
        
        # æ£€æŸ¥OAuthå®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦ç‰¹å®šæƒé™
        client = validation_result["client"]
        if client.required_permission:
            from backend.auth.crud import RoleRepository, PermissionRepository
            from backend.auth.rbac import get_user_permissions
            
            role_repo = RoleRepository()
            permission_repo = PermissionRepository()
            user_permissions = await get_user_permissions(current_user, role_repo, permission_repo)
            
            if client.required_permission not in user_permissions:
                logger.warning(
                    f"ç”¨æˆ· {current_user.username} (ID: {current_user.id}) å°è¯•è®¿é—® OAuth å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ "
                    f"{client.client_name} (client_id: {client.client_id})ï¼Œä½†ç¼ºå°‘æ‰€éœ€æƒé™: {client.required_permission}"
                )
                # è¿”å›æƒé™ä¸è¶³çš„é”™è¯¯ï¼Œé‡å®šå‘åˆ°é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
                error_params = {
                    "error": "access_denied",
                    "error_description": f"æ‚¨æ²¡æœ‰è®¿é—® {client.client_name} çš„æƒé™ã€‚éœ€è¦æƒé™: {client.required_permission}"
                }
                if request.state:
                    error_params["state"] = request.state
                
                error_url = f"{request.redirect_uri}?{urlencode(error_params)}"
                raise HTTPException(
                    status_code=status.HTTP_403_FORBIDDEN,
                    detail=f"æ‚¨æ²¡æœ‰è®¿é—® {client.client_name} çš„æƒé™"
                )
            
            logger.info(
                f"ç”¨æˆ· {current_user.username} (ID: {current_user.id}) é€šè¿‡æƒé™éªŒè¯ï¼Œ"
                f"å¯ä»¥è®¿é—® OAuth å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ {client.client_name} (æƒé™: {client.required_permission})"
            )
        
        # è‹¥æœªæ˜¾å¼æä¾› approvedï¼Œåˆ™è§†ä¸ºåŒæ„ï¼ˆä¸ç°æœ‰å‰ç«¯å…¼å®¹ï¼‰
        is_approved = True if approved is None else bool(approved)
        if not is_approved:
            # ç”¨æˆ·æ‹’ç»æˆæƒ
            error_params = {
                "error": "access_denied",
                "error_description": "ç”¨æˆ·æ‹’ç»äº†æˆæƒè¯·æ±‚"
            }
            if request.state:
                error_params["state"] = request.state
            
            error_url = f"{request.redirect_uri}?{urlencode(error_params)}"
            return {
                "error": "access_denied",
                "error_description": "ç”¨æˆ·æ‹’ç»äº†æˆæƒè¯·æ±‚",
                "redirect_url": error_url
            }
        
        # åˆ›å»ºæˆæƒç 
        scopes = request.scope.split() if request.scope else ["read"]
        result = await oauth_service.create_authorization_code(
            client_id=request.client_id,
            user_id=str(current_user.id),
            redirect_uri=request.redirect_uri,
            scopes=scopes,
            state=request.state
        )
        
        if not result["success"]:
            raise HTTPException(
                status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
                detail=result["error_description"]
            )
        
        return {
            "redirect_url": result["redirect_url"],
            "authorization_code": result["authorization_code"].code
        }
        
    except HTTPException:
        raise
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"OAuthæˆæƒç¡®è®¤å¤±è´¥: {e!s}")
        raise HTTPException(
            status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
            detail="æˆæƒç¡®è®¤å¤±è´¥"
        )


@router.post("/oauth/token", response_model=OAuthTokenResponse)
async def oauth_token(request: Request):
    """
    OAuth 2.0 ä»¤ç‰Œç«¯ç‚¹
    ä½¿ç”¨æˆæƒç æ¢å–è®¿é—®ä»¤ç‰Œï¼Œæˆ–ä½¿ç”¨åˆ·æ–°ä»¤ç‰Œè·å–æ–°ä»¤ç‰Œ
    """
    try:
        oauth_service = OAuthService()
        
        # åŒæ—¶æ”¯æŒ application/x-www-form-urlencoded ä¸ application/json
        content_type = (request.headers.get("content-type") or "").lower()
        data = {}
        if "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" in content_type or "multipart/form-data" in content_type:
            form = await request.form()
            data = {k: form.get(k) for k in [
                "grant_type", "code", "redirect_uri", "client_id", "client_secret", "refresh_token"
            ]}
        else:
            try:
                body = await request.json()
                if isinstance(body, dict):
                    data = body
            except Exception:
                data = {}

        grant_type = (data.get("grant_type") or "").strip()
        if grant_type == "authorization_code":
            code = data.get("code")
            redirect_uri = data.get("redirect_uri")
            client_id = data.get("client_id")
            client_secret = data.get("client_secret")
            if not all([code, redirect_uri, client_id, client_secret]):
                raise HTTPException(status_code=400, detail="ç¼ºå°‘å¿…è¦çš„å‚æ•°")
            result = await oauth_service.exchange_code_for_token(
                code=code,
                client_id=client_id,
                client_secret=client_secret,
                redirect_uri=redirect_uri
            )
        elif grant_type == "refresh_token":
            refresh_token = data.get("refresh_token")
            client_id = data.get("client_id")
            client_secret = data.get("client_secret")
            if not all([refresh_token, client_id, client_secret]):
                raise HTTPException(status_code=400, detail="ç¼ºå°‘å¿…è¦çš„å‚æ•°")
            result = await oauth_service.refresh_access_token(
                refresh_token=refresh_token,
                client_id=client_id,
                client_secret=client_secret
            )
        else:
            raise HTTPException(status_code=400, detail="ä¸æ”¯æŒçš„æˆæƒç±»å‹")
        
        if not result["success"]:
            raise HTTPException(
                status_code=status.HTTP_400_BAD_REQUEST,
                detail=result["error_description"]
            )
        
        return result["token_response"]
        
    except HTTPException:
        raise
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"OAuthä»¤ç‰Œäº¤æ¢å¤±è´¥: {e!s}")
        raise HTTPException(
            status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
            detail="ä»¤ç‰Œäº¤æ¢å¤±è´¥"
        )


@router.get("/oauth/userinfo", response_model=OAuthUserInfo)
async def oauth_userinfo(request: Request):
    """
    OAuth 2.0 ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ç«¯ç‚¹
    è·å–å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·çš„åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯
    """
    try:
        # ä»è¯·æ±‚å¤´æå–è®¿é—®ä»¤ç‰Œ
        auth_header = request.headers.get("authorization") or request.headers.get("Authorization")
        if not auth_header or not auth_header.startswith("Bearer "):
            raise HTTPException(
                status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
                detail="æ— æ•ˆçš„æˆæƒå¤´æ ¼å¼"
            )
        access_token = auth_header[7:]  # ç§»é™¤ "Bearer " å‰ç¼€
        
        oauth_service = OAuthService()
        result = await oauth_service.get_user_info(access_token)
        
        if not result["success"]:
            raise HTTPException(
                status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
                detail=result["error_description"]
            )
        
        return result["user_info"]
        
    except HTTPException:
        raise
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"è·å–OAuthç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯å¤±è´¥: {e!s}")
        raise HTTPException(
            status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
            detail="è·å–ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯å¤±è´¥"
        )

@router.get("/admin/cli-stats", response_model=List[CLIStatsResponse])
async def get_cli_weekly_stats(
    weeks: Optional[int] = Query(4, description="è·å–æœ€è¿‘å‡ å‘¨çš„æ•°æ®"),
    current_user: UserDB = Depends(get_current_admin_user)
):
    """
    è·å–CLIä½¿ç”¨å‘¨ç»Ÿè®¡æ’è¡Œæ¦œï¼ˆç®¡ç†å‘˜ä¸“ç”¨ï¼‰
    ç»Ÿè®¡æ¶ˆæ¯æ•°é‡å¤§äº50çš„ç”¨æˆ·ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶åŒ…å«æœ‰çœŸåæ˜ å°„ä½†æ¶ˆæ¯æ•°ä¸º0çš„ç”¨æˆ·
    """
    try:
        from datetime import datetime, timedelta
        from backend.db.mongodb import mongo_manager
        from collections import defaultdict
        
        # CLIæ’è¡Œæ¦œç”¨æˆ·åæ˜ å°„é…ç½®
        # åœ¨è¿™é‡Œç»´æŠ¤ç”¨æˆ·åå’ŒçœŸåçš„å¯¹åº”å…³ç³»
        USERNAME_MAPPING = {
            # ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š
            # "john_doe": "å¼ ä¸‰",
            # "jane_smith": "æå››",
            # "admin": "ç®¡ç†å‘˜",
            "tangbohao@sjtu.edu.cn":"å”æ³¢æ˜Š",
            "hz.czar@sjtu.edu.cn":"å¾ä¸ºå…ˆ",
            "1217456181@qq.com":"è‚–æ¨",
            "zymx@pm.me":"åº„è£•æ—»",
            "2623706775@gmail.com":"å¶ç»¿æ»¡å±±",
            "1770418133@qq.com":"åˆ˜ä¸€ç§€",
            "mhjiang0408":"è’‹æ²«æ™—",
            "jiadisu7@gmail.com":"è‹ä½³è¿ª",
            "theunknownthing@sjtu.edu.cn":"ç‹ç¿°å®",
            "ljf2570@sjtu.edu.cn":"æ—çºªå¸†",
            "sunjie2019@mail.ustc.edu.cn":"å­™æ°",
            "3099508313@qq.com":"å¸ä¼Ÿä¸š",
            "yanma23@m.fudan.edu.cn":"é©¬ç°",
            "ernaxx@163.com":"é‚µæ–‡å¨Ÿ",
            "zengzhi.wang":"ç‹å¢å¿—",
            "ethanicchern@gmail.com":"é™ˆå¥•ç¾¤",
            "sunmouren@situ.edu.cn":"å­™äºæ¶µ",
            "zeng_ji@sjtu.edu.cn":"æ›¾æµ",
            "Kenny1004@sjtu.edu.cn":"èƒ¡ç«¹éœ–",
            "xuefengli@sjtu.edu.cn":"æå­¦å³°",
            "tzxu_1213@sjtu.edu.cn":"å¾å¤©æ³½",
            "xtzorz@bupt.edu.cn":"å¾å¤©æ³½",
            "xtz.orz@gmail.com":"å¾å¤©æ³½",
            "billli.prvt@gmail.com":"æé€¸è¿œ",
            "zouhy21@m.fudan.edu.cn":"é‚¹çš“é˜³",
            "chlorophyll@sjtu.edu.cn":"æå…‹é’°",
            "3144763681@qq.com":"èŠ±å¯ç¡•",
            "fdy@bupt.edu.cn":"å‚…å¤§æº",
            "13003913026@163.com":"å´æ˜€æ³½",
            "shijiexia@sjtu.edu.cn":"å¤ä¸–æ°",
            "1873718166@qq.com":"å®“ç”°ç”°",
            "huangzhen@gair.com":"é»„è‡»",
            "nanyang0518@foxmail.com":"å—æ¨",
            "junfeifeifei@gmail.com":"ç‹éªé£",
            "1175794600@qq.com":"è”¡æ™“æ°"
            # åœ¨è¿™é‡Œæ·»åŠ ä½ çš„ç”¨æˆ·åæ˜ å°„
            # "ç”¨æˆ·å": "çœŸå",
        }
        
        def get_display_name(username: str) -> str:
            """è·å–ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ˜¾ç¤ºåç§°ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰çœŸåæ˜ å°„åˆ™è¿”å›çœŸåï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¿”å›ç”¨æˆ·å"""
            return USERNAME_MAPPING.get(username, username)
        
        def get_mapped_users() -> set:
            """è·å–æ‰€æœ‰æœ‰çœŸåæ˜ å°„çš„ç”¨æˆ·åé›†åˆ"""
            return set(USERNAME_MAPPING.keys())
        
        def has_real_name(username: str) -> bool:
            """æ£€æŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·æ˜¯å¦æœ‰çœŸåæ˜ å°„"""
            return username in USERNAME_MAPPING
        
        # è®¡ç®—å‘¨èŒƒå›´ - ä»å‘¨äºŒå¼€å§‹è®¡ç®—
        today = datetime.now()
        # æ‰¾åˆ°æœ€è¿‘çš„å‘¨äºŒä½œä¸ºèµ·å§‹ç‚¹
        # weekday(): 0=Monday, 1=Tuesday, 2=Wednesday, ...
        days_since_tuesday = (today.weekday() - 1) % 7
        current_tuesday = today - timedelta(days=days_since_tuesday)
        
        results = []
        
        for week_offset in range(weeks):
            week_start = current_tuesday - timedelta(weeks=week_offset)
            week_end = week_start + timedelta(days=6, hours=23, minutes=59, seconds=59)
            
            # æŸ¥è¯¢è¯¥å‘¨çš„è½¨è¿¹æ•°æ®
            trajectory_collection = mongo_manager.db.engineer_trajectory_files
            user_collection = mongo_manager.db.users
            
            # èšåˆæŸ¥è¯¢ï¼šç»Ÿè®¡æ¶ˆæ¯æ•°å¤§äº50çš„ä¼šè¯ï¼Œç„¶åæŒ‰ç”¨æˆ·æ±‡æ€»
            pipeline = [
                {
                    "$match": {
                        "updated_at": {
                            "$gte": week_start,
                            "$lte": week_end
                        },
                        "trajectory_count": {"$gt": 50}  # åªç»Ÿè®¡æ¶ˆæ¯æ•°å¤§äº50çš„ä¼šè¯
                    }
                },
                {
                    "$group": {
                        "_id": "$user_id",
                        "total_messages": {"$sum": "$trajectory_count"},
                        "total_sessions": {"$sum": 1}
                    }
                }
            ]
            
            trajectory_stats = await trajectory_collection.aggregate(pipeline).to_list(length=None)
            
            # åˆ›å»ºç”¨æˆ·ç»Ÿè®¡å­—å…¸
            user_stats_dict = {}
            for stat in trajectory_stats:
                user_stats_dict[str(stat["_id"])] = {
                    "total_messages": stat["total_messages"],
                    "total_sessions": stat["total_sessions"]
                }
            
            # è·å–æ‰€æœ‰æœ‰çœŸåæ˜ å°„çš„ç”¨æˆ·
            mapped_usernames = get_mapped_users()
            
            # æŸ¥è¯¢æ‰€æœ‰ç›¸å…³ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
            week_stats = []
            processed_users = set()
            
            # é¦–å…ˆå¤„ç†æœ‰ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®çš„ç”¨æˆ·
            for user_id_str, stats in user_stats_dict.items():
                user = None
                try:
                    # å°è¯•ä¸åŒçš„æŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹å¼
                    from bson import ObjectId
                    try:
                        user = await user_collection.find_one({"_id": ObjectId(user_id_str)})
                    except Exception:
                        user = await user_collection.find_one({"_id": user_id_str})
                except Exception:
                    continue
                
                if user:
                    username = user.get("username", "æœªçŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·")
                    processed_users.add(username)
                    
                    week_stats.append(CLIWeeklyStats(
                        user_id=user_id_str,
                        username=username,
                        display_name=get_display_name(username),
                        email=user.get("email", ""),
                        week_start=week_start.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
                        week_end=week_end.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
                        total_messages=stats["total_messages"],
                        total_sessions=stats["total_sessions"],
                        has_real_name=has_real_name(username)
                    ))
            
            # ç„¶åæ·»åŠ æœ‰çœŸåæ˜ å°„ä½†æ²¡æœ‰ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®çš„ç”¨æˆ·ï¼ˆæ¶ˆæ¯æ•°ä¸º0ï¼‰
            for mapped_username in mapped_usernames:
                if mapped_username not in processed_users:
                    # æŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
                    user = await user_collection.find_one({"username": mapped_username})
                    if user:
                        week_stats.append(CLIWeeklyStats(
                            user_id=str(user["_id"]),
                            username=mapped_username,
                            display_name=get_display_name(mapped_username),
                            email=user.get("email", ""),
                            week_start=week_start.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
                            week_end=week_end.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
                            total_messages=0,
                            total_sessions=0,
                            has_real_name=True
                        ))
            
            # æŒ‰æ¶ˆæ¯æ•°æ’åºï¼Œæœ‰çœŸåçš„0æ¶ˆæ¯ç”¨æˆ·æ’åœ¨æœ€å
            week_stats.sort(key=lambda x: (x.total_messages, x.has_real_name), reverse=True)
            
            results.append(CLIStatsResponse(
                week_start=week_start.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
                week_end=week_end.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
                stats=week_stats,
                total_qualified_users=len(week_stats)
            ))
        
        return results
        
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"è·å–CLIç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥: {e!s}")
        raise HTTPException(
            status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
            detail="è·å–ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥"
        )

        }
        
        def get_display_name(username: str) -> str:
            """è·å–ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ˜¾ç¤ºåç§°ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰çœŸåæ˜ å°„åˆ™è¿”å›çœŸåï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¿”å›ç”¨æˆ·å"""
            return USERNAME_MAPPING.get(username, username)
        
        def get_mapped_users() -> set:
            """è·å–æ‰€æœ‰æœ‰çœŸåæ˜ å°„çš„ç”¨æˆ·åé›†åˆ"""
            return set(USERNAME_MAPPING.keys())
        
        def has_real_name(username: str) -> bool:
            """æ£€æŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·æ˜¯å¦æœ‰çœŸåæ˜ å°„"""
            return username in USERNAME_MAPPING
        
        # è®¡ç®—å‘¨èŒƒå›´ - ä»å‘¨äºŒå¼€å§‹è®¡ç®—
        today = datetime.now()
        # æ‰¾åˆ°æœ€è¿‘çš„å‘¨äºŒä½œä¸ºèµ·å§‹ç‚¹
        # weekday(): 0=Monday, 1=Tuesday, 2=Wednesday, ...
        days_since_tuesday = (today.weekday() - 1) % 7
        current_tuesday = today - timedelta(days=days_since_tuesday)
        
        results = []
        
        for week_offset in range(weeks):
            week_start = current_tuesday - timedelta(weeks=week_offset)
            week_end = week_start + timedelta(days=6, hours=23, minutes=59, seconds=59)
            
            # æŸ¥è¯¢è¯¥å‘¨çš„è½¨è¿¹æ•°æ®
            trajectory_collection = mongo_manager.db.engineer_trajectory_files
            user_collection = mongo_manager.db.users
            
            # èšåˆæŸ¥è¯¢ï¼šç»Ÿè®¡æ¶ˆæ¯æ•°å¤§äº50çš„ä¼šè¯ï¼Œç„¶åæŒ‰ç”¨æˆ·æ±‡æ€»
            pipeline = [
                {
                    "$match": {
                        "updated_at": {
                            "$gte": week_start,
                            "$lte": week_end
                        },
                        "trajectory_count": {"$gt": 50}  # åªç»Ÿè®¡æ¶ˆæ¯æ•°å¤§äº50çš„ä¼šè¯
                    }
                },
                {
                    "$group": {
                        "_id": "$user_id",
                        "total_messages": {"$sum": "$trajectory_count"},
                        "total_sessions": {"$sum": 1}
                    }
                }
            ]
            
            trajectory_stats = await trajectory_collection.aggregate(pipeline).to_list(length=None)
            
            # åˆ›å»ºç”¨æˆ·ç»Ÿè®¡å­—å…¸
            user_stats_dict = {}
            for stat in trajectory_stats:
                user_stats_dict[str(stat["_id"])] = {
                    "total_messages": stat["total_messages"],
                    "total_sessions": stat["total_sessions"]
                }
            
            # è·å–æ‰€æœ‰æœ‰çœŸåæ˜ å°„çš„ç”¨æˆ·
            mapped_usernames = get_mapped_users()
            
            # æŸ¥è¯¢æ‰€æœ‰ç›¸å…³ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
            week_stats = []
            processed_users = set()
            
            # é¦–å…ˆå¤„ç†æœ‰ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®çš„ç”¨æˆ·
            for user_id_str, stats in user_stats_dict.items():
                user = None
                try:
                    # å°è¯•ä¸åŒçš„æŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹å¼
                    from bson import ObjectId
                    try:
                        user = await user_collection.find_one({"_id": ObjectId(user_id_str)})
                    except Exception:
                        user = await user_collection.find_one({"_id": user_id_str})
                except Exception:
                    continue
                
                if user:
                    username = user.get("username", "æœªçŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·")
                    processed_users.add(username)
                    
                    week_stats.append(CLIWeeklyStats(
                        user_id=user_id_str,
                        username=username,
                        display_name=get_display_name(username),
                        email=user.get("email", ""),
                        week_start=week_start.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
                        week_end=week_end.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
                        total_messages=stats["total_messages"],
                        total_sessions=stats["total_sessions"],
                        has_real_name=has_real_name(username)
                    ))
            
            # ç„¶åæ·»åŠ æœ‰çœŸåæ˜ å°„ä½†æ²¡æœ‰ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®çš„ç”¨æˆ·ï¼ˆæ¶ˆæ¯æ•°ä¸º0ï¼‰
            for mapped_username in mapped_usernames:
                if mapped_username not in processed_users:
                    # æŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
                    user = await user_collection.find_one({"username": mapped_username})
                    if user:
                        week_stats.append(CLIWeeklyStats(
                            user_id=str(user["_id"]),
                            username=mapped_username,
                            display_name=get_display_name(mapped_username),
                            email=user.get("email", ""),
                            week_start=week_start.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
                            week_end=week_end.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
                            total_messages=0,
                            total_sessions=0,
                            has_real_name=True
                        ))
            
            # æŒ‰æ¶ˆæ¯æ•°æ’åºï¼Œæœ‰çœŸåçš„0æ¶ˆæ¯ç”¨æˆ·æ’åœ¨æœ€å
            week_stats.sort(key=lambda x: (x.total_messages, x.has_real_name), reverse=True)
            
            results.append(CLIStatsResponse(
                week_start=week_start.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
                week_end=week_end.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
                stats=week_stats,
                total_qualified_users=len(week_stats)
            ))
        
        return results
        
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"è·å–CLIæ’è¡Œæ¦œæ•°æ®å¤±è´¥: {e!s}")
        raise HTTPException(
            status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
            detail="è·å–æ’è¡Œæ¦œæ•°æ®å¤±è´¥"
        )

                                     additional_data: Optional[dict] = None):
    """å¼‚æ­¥è¿½è¸ªè®¤çŸ¥ç›¸å…³äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œä¸é˜»å¡ä¸»æµç¨‹"""

        await telemetry_service.track_event(event)

@router.get("/{cognition_id}/recommendations")
async def get_cognition_recommendations(
    cognition_id: str,
    max_results: int = Query(3, description="è¿”å›çš„æœ€å¤§æ¨èæ•°"),
    threshold: float = Query(0.01, description="ç›¸ä¼¼åº¦é˜ˆå€¼"),
    current_user: Optional[UserDB] = Depends(get_optional_current_user),
    cognition_db: CognitionDatabase = Depends(get_cognition_database)
):
    """è·å–ä¸ç‰¹å®šè®¤çŸ¥ç›¸å…³çš„æ¨è"""
    try:
        # 1. è·å–å½“å‰è®¤çŸ¥è¯¦æƒ…
        current_cognition = await cognition_db.get_cognition_by_id(cognition_id)
        if not current_cognition:
            raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="è®¤çŸ¥ä¸å­˜åœ¨")
        
        # 2. è·å–ç›¸å…³æ¨è
        # å‡†å¤‡æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®
        query_cognition = {
            'id': current_cognition.get('id'),
            'question': current_cognition.get('question_zh') or current_cognition.get('question_en') or '',
            'answer': current_cognition.get('answer_zh') or current_cognition.get('answer_en') or ''
        }

        # ä½¿ç”¨æ¨èåŠŸèƒ½è·å–ç›¸å…³è®¤çŸ¥
        related_cognitions = get_related_cognitions_(query_cognition, threshold, max_results)
        
        # 3. æ ¼å¼åŒ–ç»“æœ
        recommendations = format_recommendations_for_display_(related_cognitions)
        
        # 4. ä»æ•°æ®åº“è¡¥å……æ›´å¤šè¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯
        for rec in recommendations:
            # è·å–å®Œæ•´è®¤çŸ¥ä¿¡æ¯
            cognition = await cognition_db.get_cognition_by_id(rec['id'])
            if cognition:
                # ä½¿ç”¨æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­çš„å­—æ®µæ›´æ–°æ ‡é¢˜å’Œé¢„è§ˆ
                rec['title'] = cognition.get('abstract_zh') or cognition.get('abstract_en') or rec['title']
                if not rec['title'] or rec['title'] == '':
                    rec['title'] = cognition.get('question_zh') or cognition.get('question_en') or 'æœªçŸ¥æ ‡é¢˜'
                    
                # æˆªæ–­æ ‡é¢˜
                if len(rec['title']) > 50:
                    rec['title'] = rec['title'][:50] + '...'
                
                # ä½¿ç”¨answerä½œä¸ºé¢„è§ˆ
                preview_text = cognition.get('answer_zh') or cognition.get('answer_en') or ''
                if preview_text:
                    rec['preview'] = preview_text[:100] + ('...' if len(preview_text) > 100 else '')

                # æ·»åŠ æ ‡ç­¾ä¿¡æ¯
                rec['primary_topic'] = cognition.get('primary_topic')
                rec['related_topics'] = cognition.get('related_topic', [])  # æ³¨æ„MongoDBä¸­æ˜¯related_topicè€Œä¸æ˜¯related_topics 
                rec['tag'] = cognition.get('tag', [])
                rec['blogger'] = cognition.get('blogger', {})
        
        return recommendations
        
    except HTTPException:
        raise
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"è·å–è®¤çŸ¥æ¨èå¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
        raise HTTPException(status_code=500, detail="è·å–æ¨èå¤±è´¥")

@router.get("/list", response_model=PaginatedCognitionResponse)
async def get_cognitions(
    skip: int = Query(0, description="è·³è¿‡çš„è®°å½•æ•°"),
    limit: int = Query(20, description="è¿”å›çš„æœ€å¤§è®°å½•æ•°"),
    search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="æœç´¢å…³é”®è¯"),
    language: Optional[str] = Query("zh", description="æ˜¾ç¤ºè¯­è¨€ï¼šzh(ä¸­æ–‡), en(è‹±æ–‡)"),
    sort: Optional[str] = Query("latest", description="æ’åºæ–¹å¼ï¼šlatest(æœ€æ–°), hot(æœ€çƒ­), most_liked(ç‚¹èµæœ€å¤š)"),
    topics: Optional[List[str]] = Query(None, description="è¯é¢˜ç­›é€‰ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šä¸ªè¯é¢˜"),
    time_filter: Optional[str] = Query("all", description="æ—¶é—´ç­›é€‰: all, day, week, month, yesterday, last_week, last_month"),
    search_scope: Optional[str] = Query("all", description="æœç´¢èŒƒå›´: all, favorites, follows"),
    source_filter: Optional[str] = Query("all", description="æ¥æºç­›é€‰: all, Hugging Face Paper, Arxiv, Sam Altman, Andrej Karpathy, Elon Musk, Reddit"),
    author_filter: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="ä½œè€…ç­›é€‰: all, Sam Altman, Andrej Karpathy, Elon Musk, Jason Wei, Pengfei Liu"),
    current_user: Optional[UserDB] = Depends(get_optional_current_user),
    cognition_db: CognitionDatabase = Depends(get_cognition_database),
    favorites_db: CognitionFavoritesDatabase = Depends(get_cognition_favorites_database),
    read_status_db: CognitionReadStatusDatabase = Depends(get_cognition_read_status_database),
    follow_db: UserFollowDatabase = Depends(get_user_follow_database)
):
    """è·å–è®¤çŸ¥åˆ—è¡¨"""
    try:
        user_id = str(current_user.id) if current_user else None

        if search_scope == 'favorites' and current_user:
            # åœ¨æ”¶è—ä¸­æœç´¢æˆ–åˆ—å‡ºæ‰€æœ‰æ”¶è—
            data = await favorites_db.get_favorited_cognitions(
                user_id=user_id,
                skip=skip,
                limit=limit,
                search=search,
                time_filter=time_filter,
                source_filter=source_filter,
                sort=sort
            )
            cognitions_data = data.get("items", [])
            total_count = data.get("total", 0)
        elif search_scope == 'follows' and current_user:
            # åœ¨å…³æ³¨ä¸­æœç´¢ï¼šè·å–ç”¨æˆ·å…³æ³¨çš„è¯é¢˜å’Œæ¥æº
            followed_topics = await follow_db.get_user_followed_items(user_id, "topic")
            followed_sources = await follow_db.get_user_followed_items(user_id, "source")
            
            # å¦‚æœç”¨æˆ·æ²¡æœ‰å…³æ³¨ä»»ä½•å†…å®¹ï¼Œè¿”å›ç©ºç»“æœ
            if not followed_topics and not followed_sources:
                cognitions_data = []
                total_count = 0
            else:
                # æ„å»ºæŸ¥è¯¢æ¡ä»¶ï¼šåŒ¹é…å…³æ³¨çš„è¯é¢˜æˆ–æ¥æº
                follow_query_conditions = []
                
                if followed_topics:
                    follow_query_conditions.append({
                        "$or": [
                            {"primary_topic": {"$in": followed_topics}},
                            {"related_topic": {"$in": followed_topics}}
                        ]
                    })
                
                if followed_sources:
                    follow_query_conditions.append({"source": {"$in": followed_sources}})
                
                # å¦‚æœåŒæ—¶å…³æ³¨äº†è¯é¢˜å’Œæ¥æºï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ORé€»è¾‘
                if len(follow_query_conditions) > 1:
                    custom_query = {"$or": follow_query_conditions}
                else:
                    custom_query = follow_query_conditions[0] if follow_query_conditions else {}
                
                # åœ¨å…³æ³¨çš„å†…å®¹ä¸­è¿›è¡Œç­›é€‰
                cognitions_data, total_count = await asyncio.gather(
                    cognition_db.get_cognitions_paginated(
                        skip=skip, limit=limit, search=search, sort=sort,
                        topics=topics, user_id=user_id, time_filter=time_filter,
                        source_filter=source_filter, author_filter=author_filter,
                        custom_query=custom_query
                    ),
                    cognition_db.get_cognitions_count(

                    # ä¸ºå…³æ³¨æœç´¢ç»“æœé™„åŠ æ”¶è—çŠ¶æ€å’Œå·²è¯»çŠ¶æ€

        elif search_scope == 'my_creations' and current_user:
            # è·å–ç”¨æˆ·åˆ›å»ºçš„ç§æœ‰è®¤çŸ¥ï¼ˆç±»ä¼¼"æˆ‘åˆ›å»ºçš„"æ”¶è—å¤¹é€»è¾‘ï¼‰
            from backend.cognition.database import CognitionPrivateDatabase

                    "likes": 0,  # ç§æœ‰è®¤çŸ¥æ²¡æœ‰æŠ•ç¥¨
                    "neutral": 0,
                    "dislikes": 0,
                    "comments": [],  # ç§æœ‰è®¤çŸ¥æ²¡æœ‰è¯„è®º
                    "votes": [],

                    "updated_at": updated_at,
                    "user_vote": None,
                    "favorite_status": {"is_favorited": False, "collections": []},
                    "read_status": {"is_read": False, "read_at": None},
                    "primary_topic": cognition.get("primary_topic"),
                    "related_topics": cognition.get("related_topics", []),

                    "cover_url": cognition.get("cover_url"),

                    # ç§æœ‰è®¤çŸ¥ç‰¹æœ‰çš„å­—æ®µ
                    "is_private": True,

                }
                
                cognitions.append(cognition_response)
            
            cognitions_data = cognitions
            
        else:
            # å…¨å±€æœç´¢
            cognitions_data, total_count = await asyncio.gather(
                cognition_db.get_cognitions_paginated(
                    skip=skip, limit=limit, search=search, sort=sort, 
                    topics=topics, user_id=user_id, time_filter=time_filter,
                    source_filter=source_filter, author_filter=author_filter
                ),
                cognition_db.get_cognitions_count(
                    search=search, topics=topics, time_filter=time_filter,
                    source_filter=source_filter, author_filter=author_filter
                )
            )
        
            # æ‰¹é‡è·å–æ”¶è—çŠ¶æ€å’Œå·²è¯»çŠ¶æ€
            if cognitions_data and user_id:
                cognition_ids = [cognition.get("id", "") for cognition in cognitions_data]
                favorite_statuses, read_statuses = await asyncio.gather(
                    favorites_db.get_favorite_statuses_batch(cognition_ids, user_id),
                    read_status_db.get_read_statuses_batch(cognition_ids, user_id)
                )
                
                # ä¸ºå…¨å±€æœç´¢ç»“æœé™„åŠ æ”¶è—çŠ¶æ€å’Œå·²è¯»çŠ¶æ€
                for cog in cognitions_data:
                    cog['favorite_status'] = favorite_statuses.get(cog.get('id', ''), {"is_favorited": False, "collections": []})
                    cog['read_status'] = read_statuses.get(cog.get('id', ''), {"is_read": False, "read_at": None})
             
        
        # ä¸ºæ”¶è—æœç´¢ç»“æœä¹Ÿæ·»åŠ å·²è¯»çŠ¶æ€ï¼ˆå¦‚æœè¿˜æ²¡æœ‰çš„è¯ï¼‰
        if search_scope == 'favorites' and cognitions_data and user_id:
            cognition_ids = [cognition.get("id", "") for cognition in cognitions_data]
            read_statuses = await read_status_db.get_read_statuses_batch(cognition_ids, user_id)
            for cog in cognitions_data:
                if 'read_status' not in cog:  # é¿å…é‡å¤è®¾ç½®
                    cog['read_status'] = read_statuses.get(cog.get('id', ''), {"is_read": False, "read_at": None})
        
        # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå“åº”æ¨¡å‹
        response_list = []
        for cognition_data in cognitions_data:
            # favorite_status å’Œ read_status å·²ç»åœ¨ä¸Šé¢é™„åŠ å¥½äº†
            response_data = CognitionResponse(**cognition_data)
            response_data.favorite_status = cognition_data.get('favorite_status')
            response_data.read_status = cognition_data.get('read_status')
            response_list.append(response_data)
        
        return PaginatedCognitionResponse(
            items=response_list,
            total=total_count,
            page=(skip // limit) + 1,
            size=limit,
            pages=(total_count + limit - 1) // limit
        )
    except Exception as e:
        import traceback
        traceback.print_exc()
        logger.error(f"è·å–è®¤çŸ¥åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥: {e!s}")
        raise HTTPException(status_code=500, detail="è·å–è®¤çŸ¥åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥")

@router.get("/hot-ranking")
async def get_hot_ranking(
    time_filter: Optional[str] = Query("day", description="æ—¶é—´ç­›é€‰: day, week, month"),
    include_comparison: Optional[bool] = Query(True, description="æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«å¯¹æ¯”æ•°æ®"),
    topic_limit: Optional[int] = Query(6, description="çƒ­é—¨è¯é¢˜æ•°é‡é™åˆ¶"),
    cognition_limit: Optional[int] = Query(10, description="çƒ­é—¨è®¤çŸ¥æ•°é‡é™åˆ¶"),
    current_user: Optional[UserDB] = Depends(get_optional_current_user),
    cognition_db: CognitionDatabase = Depends(get_cognition_database)
):
    """ä¸“é—¨çš„çƒ­æ¦œAPI - ä¼˜åŒ–æ€§èƒ½ï¼Œåªè¿”å›çƒ­æ¦œéœ€è¦çš„æ ¸å¿ƒæ•°æ®"""
    try:
        if time_filter == 'day':
            time_filter = 'last_three_days'

        # è·å–å¯¹æ¯”æ—¶é—´ç­›é€‰æ˜ å°„
        comparison_map = {
            'last_three_days': 'last_six_days',
            'week': 'last_week',
            'month': 'last_month'
        }

        user_id = str(current_user.id) if current_user else None

        # è·å–å½“å‰æ—¶é—´æ®µæ•°æ®
        current_cognitions = await cognition_db.get_cognitions_paginated(
            skip=0,
            limit=1000,  # å‡å°‘æ•°æ®é‡ï¼Œåªè·å–1000æ¡ç”¨äºç»Ÿè®¡
            time_filter=time_filter,
            source_filter='all',
            user_id=user_id
        )

        # è·å–å¯¹æ¯”æ—¶é—´æ®µæ•°æ®ï¼ˆå¦‚æœéœ€è¦ï¼‰
        comparison_cognitions = []
        if include_comparison and time_filter in comparison_map:
            comparison_filter = comparison_map[time_filter]
            comparison_cognitions = await cognition_db.get_cognitions_paginated(
                skip=0,
                limit=1000,
                time_filter=comparison_filter,
                source_filter='all',
                user_id=user_id
            )

        # å¤„ç†çƒ­é—¨è¯é¢˜ç»Ÿè®¡
        def calculate_topic_stats(cognitions):
            topic_stats = {}
            for cognition in cognitions:
                topics = []
                if cognition.get('primary_topic'):
                    topics.append(cognition['primary_topic'])
                if cognition.get('related_topic'):
                    if isinstance(cognition['related_topic'], list):
                        topics.extend(cognition['related_topic'])
                    else:
                        topics.append(cognition['related_topic'])

                for topic in topics:
                    if topic:
                        topic_stats[topic] = topic_stats.get(topic, 0) + 1
            return topic_stats

        # è®¡ç®—å½“å‰æ—¶é—´æ®µè¯é¢˜ç»Ÿè®¡
        current_topic_stats = calculate_topic_stats(current_cognitions)
        comparison_topic_stats = calculate_topic_stats(comparison_cognitions) if comparison_cognitions else {}

        # ç”Ÿæˆçƒ­é—¨è¯é¢˜åˆ—è¡¨
        total_current = len(current_cognitions)
        hot_topics = []

        for topic, count in sorted(current_topic_stats.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)[:topic_limit]:
            # è®¡ç®—æ’åå˜åŒ–
            current_rank = len(hot_topics) + 1
            previous_count = comparison_topic_stats.get(topic, 0)
            previous_rank = None
            rank_change = 'stable'
            is_new = False

            if comparison_topic_stats:
                if topic in comparison_topic_stats:
                    # æ‰¾åˆ°åœ¨å¯¹æ¯”æ•°æ®ä¸­çš„æ’å
                    sorted_comparison = sorted(comparison_topic_stats.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
                    for idx, (comp_topic, _) in enumerate(sorted_comparison):
                        if comp_topic == topic:
                            previous_rank = idx + 1
                            break

                    if previous_rank:
                        if current_rank < previous_rank:
                            rank_change = 'up'
                        elif current_rank > previous_rank:
                            rank_change = 'down'
                else:
                    is_new = True
                    rank_change = 'new'

            # è®¡ç®—çƒ­åº¦å˜åŒ–ç™¾åˆ†æ¯”
            heat_change_percent = 0
            if previous_count > 0:
                heat_change_percent = ((count - previous_count) / previous_count * 100)
            elif count > 0:
                heat_change_percent = 100

            percentage = (count / total_current * 100) if total_current > 0 else 0

            hot_topics.append({
                "topic": topic,
                "count": count,
                "percentage": round(percentage, 2),
                "currentRank": current_rank,
                "previousRank": previous_rank,
                "rankChange": rank_change,
                "isNew": is_new,
                "heatChangePercent": round(heat_change_percent, 2),
                "previousCount": previous_count,
                # ä¿æŒå‘åå…¼å®¹çš„å­—æ®µå
                "current_rank": current_rank,
                "previous_rank": previous_rank,
                "rank_change": rank_change,
                "is_new": is_new,
                "heat_change_percent": round(heat_change_percent, 2),
                "previous_count": previous_count
            })

        # è·å–çƒ­é—¨è®¤çŸ¥ï¼ˆåªè¿”å›å¿…è¦å­—æ®µï¼‰
        hot_cognitions = []

        # ========== æ–°å¢ï¼šæ‰¹é‡è·å–æ”¶è—æ•° ==========
        cognition_ids = [c.get('id') for c in current_cognitions if c.get('id')]
        favorite_counts = {}
        if cognition_ids:
            from backend.cognition.database import CognitionFavoritesDatabase
            favorites_db = CognitionFavoritesDatabase()
            pipeline = [
                {"$match": {"cognition_id": {"$in": cognition_ids}}},
                {"$group": {"_id": "$cognition_id", "count": {"$sum": 1}}}
            ]
            results = await favorites_db._collection.aggregate(pipeline).to_list(length=None)
            favorite_counts = {r['_id']: r['count'] for r in results}
        # ========== END ==========

        # æƒé‡æ’åºå‡½æ•°
        def calc_weight(cognition):
            likes = cognition.get('likes', 0)
            comments = len(cognition.get('comments', []))
            favorites = favorite_counts.get(cognition.get('id'), 0)
            return likes * 2 + favorites * 2 + comments * 3

        # æŒ‰æƒé‡æ’åº
        sorted_cognitions = sorted(current_cognitions, key=calc_weight, reverse=True)

        # åªå–å‰ cognition_limit ä¸ª
        for cognition in sorted_cognitions[:cognition_limit]:
            hot_cognitions.append({
                "id": cognition.get("id"),
                "abstract_zh": cognition.get("abstract_zh"),
                "question_zh": cognition.get("question_zh"),
                "title": cognition.get("title"),
                "content": cognition.get("content"),
                "description": cognition.get("description"),
                "raw_at": cognition.get("raw_at"),
                "primary_topic": cognition.get("primary_topic"),
                "source": cognition.get("source"),
                "likes": cognition.get("likes", 0),
                "favorites": favorite_counts.get(cognition.get('id'), 0),
                "comments_count": len(cognition.get('comments', [])),
                "weight": calc_weight(cognition),
                "neutral": cognition.get("neutral", 0),
                "dislikes": cognition.get("dislikes", 0)
            })

        return {
            "hot_topics": hot_topics,
            "hot_cognitions": hot_cognitions,
            "time_filter": time_filter,
            "total_cognitions": total_current,
            "comparison_enabled": include_comparison and bool(comparison_cognitions),
            "last_updated": datetime.now().isoformat()
        }

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"è·å–çƒ­æ¦œæ•°æ®å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
        raise HTTPException(status_code=500, detail="è·å–çƒ­æ¦œæ•°æ®å¤±è´¥")

@router.get("/trend-stats")
async def get_trend_stats(
    time_filter: Optional[str] = Query("all", description="æ—¶é—´ç­›é€‰: all, day, week, month, yesterday, last_week, last_month"),
    topics: Optional[List[str]] = Query(None, description="è¯é¢˜ç­›é€‰ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šä¸ªè¯é¢˜"),
    search_scope: Optional[str] = Query("all", description="æœç´¢èŒƒå›´: all, favorites"),
    source_filter: Optional[str] = Query("all", description="æ¥æºç­›é€‰: all, Hugging Face Paper, Arxiv, Sam Altman, Andrej Karpathy, Elon Musk, Reddit"),
    current_user: Optional[UserDB] = Depends(get_optional_current_user),
    cognition_db: CognitionDatabase = Depends(get_cognition_database),
    favorites_db: CognitionFavoritesDatabase = Depends(get_cognition_favorites_database)
):
    """è·å–è¶‹åŠ¿ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®ï¼ˆå¢å¼ºï¼šæ”¯æŒæŒ‰raw_atæ—¥æœŸå’Œå­£åº¦åˆ†ç»„ï¼‰"""
    try:
        import json
        import sys
        user_id = str(current_user.id) if current_user else None
        # æ ¹æ®æœç´¢èŒƒå›´ç¡®å®šæ•°æ®æº
        if search_scope == 'favorites' and current_user:
            data = await favorites_db.get_favorited_cognitions(
                user_id=user_id,
                skip=0,
                limit=10000,
                time_filter=time_filter,
                source_filter=source_filter
            )
            cognitions = data.get("items", [])
        else:
            cognitions = await cognition_db.get_cognitions_paginated(
                skip=0,
                limit=10000,
                topics=topics,
                time_filter=time_filter,
                source_filter=source_filter,
                user_id=user_id
            )

        # ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼šåªä¿ç•™è¶‹åŠ¿ç»Ÿè®¡æ‰€éœ€çš„å¿…è¦å­—æ®µ
        def extract_trend_data(cognition):
            """æå–è¶‹åŠ¿ç»Ÿè®¡æ‰€éœ€çš„å¿…è¦å­—æ®µ"""
            return {
                "id": cognition.get("id"),
                "primary_topic": cognition.get("primary_topic"),
                "related_topic": cognition.get("related_topic"),
                "raw_at": cognition.get("raw_at"),
                "created_at": cognition.get("created_at"),
                "likes": cognition.get("likes", 0),
                "neutral": cognition.get("neutral", 0),
                "dislikes": cognition.get("dislikes", 0)
            }
        
        # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºç²¾ç®€çš„è®¤çŸ¥æ•°æ®
        trend_cognitions = [extract_trend_data(cog) for cog in cognitions]

        # è°ƒè¯•ï¼šè®°å½•åŸå§‹æ•°æ®å¤§å°
        raw_data_size = len(json.dumps(cognitions, default=str))
        optimized_data_size = len(json.dumps(trend_cognitions, default=str))
        # è°ƒè¯•ï¼šåˆ†æå•ä¸ªè®¤çŸ¥å¯¹è±¡å¤§å°
        if cognitions:
            sample_cognition = cognitions[0]
            sample_size = len(json.dumps(sample_cognition, default=str))
            sample_optimized_size = len(json.dumps(extract_trend_data(sample_cognition), default=str))
            # åˆ†æè®¤çŸ¥å¯¹è±¡çš„ä¸»è¦å­—æ®µå¤§å°
            field_sizes = {}
            for key, value in sample_cognition.items():
                if isinstance(value, str):
                    field_sizes[key] = len(value)
                elif isinstance(value, (list, dict)):
                    field_sizes[key] = len(json.dumps(value, default=str))
                else:
                    field_sizes[key] = len(str(value))
            
            # æŒ‰å¤§å°æ’åºæ˜¾ç¤ºå­—æ®µ
            sorted_fields = sorted(field_sizes.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)

        # ç»Ÿè®¡å„ä¸ªtopicçš„æ•°é‡
        topic_stats = {}
        for cognition in trend_cognitions:  # ä½¿ç”¨ä¼˜åŒ–åçš„æ•°æ®
            cognition_topics = []
            if cognition.get('primary_topic'):
                cognition_topics.append(cognition['primary_topic'])
            if cognition.get('related_topic'):
                if isinstance(cognition['related_topic'], list):
                    cognition_topics.extend(cognition['related_topic'])
                else:
                    cognition_topics.append(cognition['related_topic'])
            for topic in cognition_topics:
                if topic:
                    topic_stats[topic] = topic_stats.get(topic, 0) + 1

        total_cognitions = len(trend_cognitions)
        sorted_topics = sorted(topic_stats.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
        trend_data = []
        for topic, count in sorted_topics:
            percentage = (count / total_cognitions * 100) if total_cognitions > 0 else 0
            trend_data.append({
                "topic": topic,
                "count": count,
                "percentage": round(percentage, 2),
                "trend": "stable"
            })

        # æ–°å¢ï¼šæŒ‰raw_atå‰10ä½åˆ†ç»„
        date_map = {}
        for cognition in trend_cognitions:  # ä½¿ç”¨ä¼˜åŒ–åçš„æ•°æ®
            raw_at = cognition.get("raw_at")
            date_str = raw_at[:10] if raw_at and len(raw_at) >= 10 else None
            if not date_str:
                continue
            if date_str not in date_map:
                date_map[date_str] = 0
            date_map[date_str] += 1
        date_stats = [
            {"date": date, "count": count}
            for date, count in sorted(date_map.items())
        ]

        # æ–°å¢ï¼šæŒ‰å­£åº¦åˆ†ç»„
        from datetime import datetime
        def get_quarter(date_str):
            try:
                if "_" in date_str:
                    dt = datetime.strptime(date_str, "%Y_%m_%d")
                else:
                    dt = datetime.strptime(date_str, "%Y-%m-%d")
                quarter = (dt.month - 1) // 3 + 1
                return f"{dt.year}-Q{quarter}"
            except Exception:
                return "æœªçŸ¥"

        quarter_map = {}
        for cognition in trend_cognitions:  # ä½¿ç”¨ä¼˜åŒ–åçš„æ•°æ®
            raw_at = cognition.get("raw_at")
            date_str = raw_at[:10] if raw_at and len(raw_at) >= 10 else None
            if not date_str:
                continue
            quarter = get_quarter(date_str)
            if quarter not in quarter_map:
                quarter_map[quarter] = 0
            quarter_map[quarter] += 1
        quarter_stats = [
            {"quarter": quarter, "count": count}
            for quarter, count in sorted(quarter_map.items())
        ]

        # æ„å»ºè¿”å›æ•°æ®
        response_data = {
            "data": trend_data,
            "total": total_cognitions,
            "time_filter": time_filter,
            "search_scope": search_scope,
            "raw_cognitions": trend_cognitions,  # ä½¿ç”¨ä¼˜åŒ–åçš„æ•°æ®
            "date_stats": date_stats,
            "quarter_stats": quarter_stats
        }
        
        # è°ƒè¯•ï¼šè®¡ç®—å„éƒ¨åˆ†æ•°æ®å¤§å°
        response_json = json.dumps(response_data, default=str)
        total_response_size = len(response_json)
        
        # è®¡ç®—å„éƒ¨åˆ†å¤§å°
        raw_cognitions_size = len(json.dumps(cognitions, default=str))
        date_stats_size = len(json.dumps(date_stats, default=str))
        quarter_stats_size = len(json.dumps(quarter_stats, default=str))
        trend_data_size = len(json.dumps(trend_data, default=str))
        
        # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æœ‰é‡å¤æ•°æ®
        if raw_cognitions_size > 0 and (date_stats_size > raw_cognitions_size * 0.8 or quarter_stats_size > raw_cognitions_size * 0.8):
            logger.warning(f"âš ï¸  æ£€æµ‹åˆ°å¯èƒ½çš„æ•°æ®é‡å¤ä¼ è¾“ï¼date_statsæˆ–quarter_statså¤§å°æ¥è¿‘raw_cognitions")
        
        return response_data

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"è·å–è¶‹åŠ¿ç»Ÿè®¡å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
        raise HTTPException(status_code=500, detail="è·å–è¶‹åŠ¿ç»Ÿè®¡å¤±è´¥")

@router.get("/collections", response_model=List[CollectionResponse])

    collections_db: CognitionCollectionsDatabase = Depends(get_cognition_collections_database)
):
    """è·å–ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ”¶è—å¤¹åˆ—è¡¨"""
    try:
        # ç¡®ä¿ç”¨æˆ·æœ‰é»˜è®¤æ”¶è—å¤¹

        # ç¡®ä¿ç”¨æˆ·æœ‰ç§æœ‰è®¤çŸ¥æ”¶è—å¤¹

        collections = []
        for collection_data in collections_data:

                id=collection_data["id"],

@router.get("/collections/{collection_id}/cognitions", response_model=CollectionCognitionsResponse)
async def get_collection_cognitions(
    collection_id: str,
    page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="é¡µç "),
    page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="æ¯é¡µæ•°é‡"),
    search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="æœç´¢å…³é”®è¯"),
    current_user: UserDB = Depends(get_current_active_user),
    collections_db: CognitionCollectionsDatabase = Depends(get_cognition_collections_database),
    favorites_db: CognitionFavoritesDatabase = Depends(get_cognition_favorites_database),
    cognition_db: CognitionDatabase = Depends(get_cognition_database),
    private_db: CognitionPrivateDatabase = Depends(get_cognition_private_database),
    read_status_db: CognitionReadStatusDatabase = Depends(get_cognition_read_status_database)
):
    """è·å–æ”¶è—å¤¹ä¸­çš„è®¤çŸ¥åˆ—è¡¨"""
    try:
        # éªŒè¯æ”¶è—å¤¹æƒé™
        collections = await collections_db.get_user_collections(str(current_user.id))
        target_collection = None
        for collection in collections:
            if collection["id"] == collection_id:
                target_collection = collection
                break
        
        if not target_collection:
            raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="æ”¶è—å¤¹ä¸å­˜åœ¨")
        
        # å¦‚æœæ˜¯"æˆ‘åˆ›å»ºçš„"æ”¶è—å¤¹ï¼Œè¿”å›ç§æœ‰è®¤çŸ¥
        if target_collection["name"] == "æˆ‘åˆ›å»ºçš„":
            # è·å–ç§æœ‰è®¤çŸ¥åˆ—è¡¨
            skip = (page - 1) * page_size
            private_cognitions, total_count = await private_db.get_user_private_cognitions(
                user_id=str(current_user.id),
                search=search,
                skip=skip,
                limit=page_size
            )
            
            # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºç¬¦åˆå“åº”æ ¼å¼çš„æ•°æ®
            cognitions = []
            for cognition in private_cognitions:
                # å¤„ç†æ—¶é—´å­—æ®µ
                created_at = cognition.get("created_at")
                
                raw_at = cognition.get("raw_at") or created_at
                
                updated_at = cognition.get("updated_at")
                
                # å¤„ç†upload_requested_atå’Œreviewed_atæ—¶é—´å­—æ®µ
                upload_requested_at = cognition.get("upload_requested_at")
                        
                reviewed_at = cognition.get("reviewed_at")
                
                html_report_generated_at = cognition.get("html_report_generated_at")
                
                # åˆ›å»ºç§æœ‰è®¤çŸ¥å“åº”å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œä¿ç•™æ‰€æœ‰é‡è¦å­—æ®µ
                cognition_response = CognitionResponse(
                    id=cognition.get("_id", ""),
                    abstract_zh=cognition.get("abstract_zh", ""),
                    abstract_en=cognition.get("abstract_en", ""),
                    background_zh=cognition.get("background_zh", ""),
                    background_en=cognition.get("background_en", ""),
                    think_zh=cognition.get("think_zh", ""),
                    think_en=cognition.get("think_en", ""),
                    question_zh=cognition.get("question_zh", ""),
                    question_en=cognition.get("question_en", ""),
                    answer_zh=cognition.get("answer_zh", ""),
                    answer_en=cognition.get("answer_en", ""),
                    source=cognition.get("source", ""),
                    author_id=cognition.get("author_id", ""),
                    author_name=cognition.get("author_name", ""),
                    blogger=cognition.get("blogger"),
                    link=cognition.get("link"),
                    content=cognition.get("content"),
                    likes=0,  # ç§æœ‰è®¤çŸ¥æ²¡æœ‰æŠ•ç¥¨
                    neutral=0,
                    dislikes=0,
                    comments=[],  # ç§æœ‰è®¤çŸ¥æ²¡æœ‰è¯„è®º
                    votes=[],
                    created_at=created_at,
                    raw_at=raw_at,
                    updated_at=updated_at,
                    user_vote=None,
                    favorite_status={"is_favorited": False, "collections": []},
                    read_status=None,
                    primary_topic=cognition.get("primary_topic"),
                    related_topics=cognition.get("related_topics", []),
                    tag=cognition.get("tag"),
                    cover_url=cognition.get("cover_url"),
                    html_report_url=cognition.get("html_report_url"),
                    html_report_status=cognition.get("html_report_status"),
                    html_report_generated_at=html_report_generated_at,
                    html_report_error=cognition.get("html_report_error"),
                    html_report_content=cognition.get("html_report_content"),
                    source_analysis=cognition.get("source_analysis"),
                    contradictions=cognition.get("contradictions"),
                    synthesis_reasoning=cognition.get("synthesis_reasoning"),
                    source_cognition_ids=cognition.get("source_cognition_ids", []),
                    # ç§æœ‰è®¤çŸ¥ç‰¹æœ‰çš„å­—æ®µ
                    is_private=True,
                    upload_status=cognition.get("upload_status", "not_uploaded"),
                    upload_requested_at=upload_requested_at,
                    reviewed_at=reviewed_at,
                    reviewed_by=cognition.get("reviewed_by"),
                    reviewer_name=cognition.get("reviewer_name"),
                    review_comment=cognition.get("review_comment"),
                    cognition_platform_id=cognition.get("cognition_platform_id")
                )
                
                cognitions.append(cognition_response)
            
            total_pages = (total_count + page_size - 1) // page_size
            
            # åˆ›å»ºæ”¶è—å¤¹å“åº”å¯¹è±¡
            collection_response = CollectionResponse(
                id=target_collection["id"],
                user_id=str(current_user.id),
                name=target_collection["name"],
                description=target_collection.get("description", ""),
                is_default=target_collection.get("is_default", False),
                created_at=get_utc_time_str(),
                updated_at=get_utc_time_str(),
                cognition_count=total_count
            )
            
            return CollectionCognitionsResponse(
                collection=collection_response,
                items=cognitions,
                total=total_count,
                page=page,
                pages=total_pages,
                page_size=page_size
            )
        
        # å¯¹äºæ™®é€šæ”¶è—å¤¹ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨åŸæœ‰é€»è¾‘
        # è·å–æ”¶è—å¤¹ä¸­çš„è®¤çŸ¥IDåˆ—è¡¨
        skip = (page - 1) * page_size
        
        # è·å–æ”¶è—è®°å½•å¹¶åˆ†é¡µ
        favorited_cognitions, total_count = await favorites_db.get_favorited_cognitions_paginated(
            str(current_user.id), 
            collection_id,
            search=search,
            skip=skip, 
            limit=page_size
        )
        
        # æ‰¹é‡è·å–è®¤çŸ¥è¯¦æƒ…
        cognition_ids = [fav["cognition_id"] for fav in favorited_cognitions]
        cognitions_data = await cognition_db.get_cognitions_by_ids(cognition_ids, str(current_user.id))
        
        # æ‰¹é‡è·å–ç”¨æˆ·æŠ•ç¥¨çŠ¶æ€
        user_votes = await cognition_db.get_user_votes_batch(cognition_ids, str(current_user.id))
        
        # æ‰¹é‡è·å–æ”¶è—çŠ¶æ€
        favorite_statuses = await favorites_db.get_favorite_statuses_batch(cognition_ids, str(current_user.id))
        
        # æ‰¹é‡è·å–é˜…è¯»çŠ¶æ€
        read_statuses = await read_status_db.get_read_statuses_batch(cognition_ids, str(current_user.id))
        
        # ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªè®¤çŸ¥æ·»åŠ ç”¨æˆ·ç›¸å…³ä¿¡æ¯
        for cognition in cognitions_data:
            cognition_id = cognition["id"]
            
            # æ·»åŠ ç”¨æˆ·æŠ•ç¥¨çŠ¶æ€
            cognition["user_vote"] = user_votes.get(cognition_id)
            
            # æ·»åŠ æ”¶è—çŠ¶æ€
            cognition["favorite_status"] = favorite_statuses.get(cognition_id, {"is_favorited": False, "collections": []})
            
            # æ·»åŠ é˜…è¯»çŠ¶æ€
            cognition["read_status"] = read_statuses.get(cognition_id, {"is_read": False, "read_at": None})
        
        # ä¿æŒæ”¶è—é¡ºåº
        cognitions_map = {c["id"]: c for c in cognitions_data}
        ordered_cognitions = []
        for fav in favorited_cognitions:
            if fav["cognition_id"] in cognitions_map:
                cognition = cognitions_map[fav["cognition_id"]]
                # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå“åº”æ ¼å¼
                cognition_response = CognitionResponse(**cognition)
                ordered_cognitions.append(cognition_response)
        
        total_pages = (total_count + page_size - 1) // page_size
        
        # åˆ›å»ºæ”¶è—å¤¹å“åº”å¯¹è±¡
        collection_response = CollectionResponse(
            id=target_collection["id"],
            user_id=str(current_user.id),
            name=target_collection["name"],
            description=target_collection.get("description", ""),
            is_default=target_collection.get("is_default", False),
            created_at=target_collection.get("created_at", get_utc_time_str()),
            updated_at=target_collection.get("updated_at", get_utc_time_str()),
            cognition_count=total_count
        )
        
        return CollectionCognitionsResponse(
            collection=collection_response,
            items=ordered_cognitions,
            total=total_count,
            page=page,
            pages=total_pages,
            page_size=page_size
        )
    except HTTPException:
        raise
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"è·å–æ”¶è—å¤¹è®¤çŸ¥å¤±è´¥: {e!s}")
        raise HTTPException(status_code=500, detail="è·å–æ”¶è—å¤¹è®¤çŸ¥å¤±è´¥")

# è®¤çŸ¥æ¼«æ¸¸ä¸“ç”¨API - è¿”å›å•ä¸ªéšæœºè®¤çŸ¥
@router.get("/random", response_model=CognitionResponse)
async def get_random_cognition(
    period: Optional[str] = Query("weekly", description="æ—¶é—´èŒƒå›´ï¼šweekly(æœ¬å‘¨), daily(ä»Šæ—¥), monthly(æœ¬æœˆ)"),
    exclude_ids: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="æ’é™¤çš„è®¤çŸ¥IDåˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œé€—å·åˆ†éš”"),
    language: Optional[str] = Query("zh", description="æ˜¾ç¤ºè¯­è¨€ï¼šzh(ä¸­æ–‡), en(è‹±æ–‡)"),
    current_user: Optional[UserDB] = Depends(get_optional_current_user),
    cognition_db: CognitionDatabase = Depends(get_cognition_database)
):
    """è·å–éšæœºè®¤çŸ¥å¡ç‰‡ï¼ˆç”¨äºè®¤çŸ¥æ¼«æ¸¸åŠŸèƒ½ï¼‰"""
    logger.info(f"ğŸ¯ éšæœºè®¤çŸ¥APIè¢«è°ƒç”¨ - period: {period}, language: {language}, user: {current_user.username if current_user else 'Anonymous'}")
    try:
        # è§£ææ’é™¤çš„IDåˆ—è¡¨
        excluded_ids = []
        if exclude_ids:
            excluded_ids = [id.strip() for id in exclude_ids.split(',') if id.strip()]

        if excluded_ids:
            logger.info(f"æ’é™¤çš„è®¤çŸ¥ID: {excluded_ids}")

        # æ˜ å°„periodåˆ°time_filter
        time_filter_map = {
            "daily": "day",
            "weekly": "week",
            "monthly": "month"
        }
        time_filter = time_filter_map.get(period, "week")

        user_id = str(current_user.id) if current_user else None
        # è·å–ç¬¦åˆæ¡ä»¶çš„è®¤çŸ¥åˆ—è¡¨
        cognitions = await cognition_db.get_cognitions_paginated(
            skip=0,
            limit=100,  # è·å–æ›´å¤šå€™é€‰é¡¹ä»¥æé«˜éšæœºæ€§
            search=None,
            sort="latest",
            topics=None,
            user_id=user_id,
            time_filter=time_filter,
            source_filter=None,
            author_filter=None
        )

        if not cognitions:
            logger.warning(f"æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°ç¬¦åˆæ¡ä»¶çš„è®¤çŸ¥ - time_filter: {time_filter}")
            raise HTTPException(status_code=204, detail="æ²¡æœ‰å¯ç”¨çš„è®¤çŸ¥å†…å®¹")

        # å¦‚æœæœ‰æ’é™¤åˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œè¿‡æ»¤æ‰è¿™äº›è®¤çŸ¥
        if excluded_ids:
            original_count = len(cognitions)
            cognitions = [c for c in cognitions if c.get('id') not in excluded_ids]

            if not cognitions:
                logger.warning("æ’é™¤æŒ‡å®šIDåæ²¡æœ‰å¯ç”¨è®¤çŸ¥")
                raise HTTPException(status_code=204, detail="æ²¡æœ‰å¯ç”¨çš„è®¤çŸ¥å†…å®¹")

        # éšæœºé€‰æ‹©ä¸€ä¸ªè®¤çŸ¥
        random_cognition_data = random.choice(cognitions)

        # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå“åº”æ ¼å¼
        user_vote = await cognition_db.get_user_vote(random_cognition_data.get('id', ''), user_id)
        random_cognition = CognitionResponse(**random_cognition_data)

        return random_cognition

    except HTTPException:
        raise
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"è·å–éšæœºè®¤çŸ¥å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
        raise HTTPException(status_code=500, detail="è·å–éšæœºè®¤çŸ¥å¤±è´¥")
